snippet: Everett Piper of Oklahoma Wesleyan University lashed out after a student at his institution said he felt victimized by a sermon on love.
abstract: Oklahoma Wesleyan University president Everett Piper scores student protesters nationwide as 'self-absorbed and narcissistic,' and says universities are not always meant to be comfortable or safe place, but to offer challenge; his post is prompted by student who said he felt 'victimized' by sermon on love, and should not have had to listen to it.
lead_paragraph: Everett Piper of Oklahoma Wesleyan University lashed out after a student at his institution said he felt victimized by a sermon on love.

headline.main: Student Protesters Self-Absorbed and Narcissistic, Oklahoma College President Says
headline.print_headline: Student Protesters Self-Absorbed and Narcissistic, Oklahoma College President Says
